channel.title: Janet Yang on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Janet Yang on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscars: Lynette Howell Taylor Elected President of Film Academy
item.description: The British Oscar-nominated producer of ‘A Star Is Born’ is the youngest person in 70 years and the first person born outside of the U.S. in 28 years to hold the position.

item.title: Oscars: Lynette Howell Taylor Elected President of Film Academy
item.description: The British Oscar-nominated producer of ‘A Star Is Born’ is the youngest person in 70 years and the first person born outside of the U.S. in 28 years to hold the position.

item.title: CJ ENM Launches First Light StoryHouse to Develop Asian Stories With Miky Lee, Janet Yang and Dominic Ng
item.description: Korean entertainment giant CJ ENM is doubling down on its commitment to Asian storytelling with the launch of First Light StoryHouse, a new label designed to elevate Asian and Asian American narrative

item.title: CJ ENM Launches First Light StoryHouse to Develop Asian Stories With Miky Lee, Janet Yang and Dominic Ng
item.description: Korean entertainment giant CJ ENM is doubling down on its commitment to Asian storytelling with the launch of First Light StoryHouse, a new label designed to elevate Asian and Asian American narrative

item.title: Korean Powerhouse CJ ENM Teams With Janet Yang, Miky Lee and Dominic Ng for Asian Storytelling Venture
item.description: The powerhouse trio will oversee a new label dedicated to authentic storytelling from the Asian diaspora, with plans to partner with major studios and streamers.

item.title: Oscars: Who Will Succeed Outgoing Film Academy President Janet Yang?
